import { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { CartContext } from '../../contexts/CartContext'; import './cart.css'; const ShoppingCart = () => { const cart = useContext(CartContext); const [tax, setTax] = useState(0); console.log("Cart Page -", cart.items); return (

Your Cart

{cart.items.map((item) => ( ))}
Title Price Quantity Total
{item.title} ${item.price} {item.quantity} ${(parseFloat(item.price) * parseInt(item.quantity)).toFixed(2)}

Sub-Total: ${cart.getTotalCost()}

Sales Tax: ${(cart.getTotalCost() * 0.1).toFixed(2)}

Grand Total:

) } export default ShoppingCart;
